original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2386)@</color>  引氣凝盾，在武將週圍形成球形菱紋氣盾，在接下來的<color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1519)@</color>秒內減少95%<color=#80cc00>物理傷害</color>。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(2386)@</color> Bleeding air condensation shield, forming a spherical diamond air shield around the generals, in the next <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(1519)@</color> reduces 95% <color=#80cc00>physical damage</color> in seconds.
